name: LIAR LIONESS VOL. 3
description:
UPDATED AS CHAPTERS COMPLETE

two opal eggs: who remembers? the curse is in choosing

TW: rape, childhood sexual abuse

sengreen is the only one who remembers what the world was, before lin xue chose to forget and enter heaven's egg, which he kept nested inside his pelvic cradle. sengreen is the only one who remembers lin xue as he was, not as he is now. 

who are you without the things that were done to you that fucked you up but made you yourself? and, what is the curse of choosing, of deciding, whether your beloved should be happy or if she should know who he was. 

sengreen bears that curse.
